body.name: HVVH 20+4 Pin Silent Noise Reduction Miner/PC GPU ATX 1600W Power Supply 87 Plus Gold Designed for US Voltage 110V 1600w Mining ETH PSU Max Support 8 Graphics with 1.5m US Plug Adapter Cable
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
features: 1600W ultra-high power, conversion efficiency of 87+ Gold.
135mm large noise reduction fan design for optimal system cooling and maximizing performance.
Original factory, all parameters are actual data without any virtual labels.
Specific designed for US voltage 110V(Can work with all range 100-240V)
Applicable to all types of mining miners (as S7,S9,L3+,D3) and Graphic PC
body.description: Input Voltage:110V(fit for all range of 100~240V) Max Support 8 graphic cards. Output Type:FULL PFC Type:Active Efficiency:87% with input 110v / 90% with input 220v Note：only our HVVH brand can work in 110v directly,we designed for US voltage 110v 12V Rail:Dual I/O Switch:Yes Cooling:135mm fan + fan Interface:1 x (20+4)PIN ; 1 x (4+4)PIN CPU ; 16 x (6+2)PIN PCI-E; 8 x 4PIN SATA ; 4 x 4PIN IDE Guard Power cord:Yes Housing size:ATX 165*150*85MM Housing material:SGCC M/B(20+4P):1(exposed 580MM) CPU(4P+4P):1(exposed 580MM) PCI-E(6+2)P:8(exposed 630MM) + 6(exposed 780MM) + 2(exposed 880MM) SATA:4(exposed 580MM) + 4(exposed 730MM) Molex 4Pin:4(exposed 880MM) Note：only our HVVH brand can work in 110v directly, we designed for US voltage 110v. You do not need to use an inverter to convert the voltage, plug and work. We use higher quality imported materials, the cost will be more expensive, and the quality will be more stable Packing 1 x 110v 1600w Power Supply 1 x US Plug Adapter Cable Note：1.If the product is DOA, please contact us and we will replace a new one to you for free.We do our best to protect the interests of customers. 2.If the product suddenly fails to work, please replace the adapter cable(we have equipped a free one). The adapter cable is a consumable, which will be damaged under long-term high-power work.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 113 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does the job
reviews.reviewText: You make your connections, plug it in and it powers up so your good to go. I saw several reviews that mentioned it was extremely loud, it's quieter than the 4 120mm fans parked next to it. So far it's been running for two months with no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good PSU for a great price
reviews.reviewText: I am extremely pleased with this PSU. I heavily Mine ETH/ETC, I originally bought this as a back up to reduce down time in the event of a PSU failure. I quickly needed to use this PSU when my name brand 1600 GOLD Thermaltake blew up after running it for 4 weeks.Installing this PSU was very easy because its cords are easy to work with and malleable, what I noticed from the beginning was the giant 135mm cooling fan on top of giant heat sinks which is needed when pumping these PSUs hard, I run all my PSUs at 80% load. This PSU comes with the standard 20+4 MB connection and 4+4 CPU connection, another aspect about this PSU is that it has (16) PCI 6+2 power plugs that run on 8 cords, this can handle running (8) Radeon RX 5700 XTs !!! There are (8) stata plugs that run on 4 cords which is enough to handle (8) GPUs, each of those (4) cords have (1) Molex which is good for extra fan plug ins.Running high loads on a PSU can cause Voltage issues and cause systems to error and mining rigs to crash, this has been a big issue in GPU mining, these PSUs seem to handle the loads fine and distribute the Voltage evenly. I have been buying these ever since and currently have (3) of these units running 80% load 24/7 going on 4 months now with ZERO problems. These PSUs cost less than half of an EVGA or Thermaltake and are better PSUs in my opinion. You can buy 2 of these for the price of one name brand PSU and from my experience these run better than the name brand units. I plan on using these on my next supercomputer builds, on top of mining I am also into building maxed out water cooled systems/servers. As you can tell I am very happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Working Power Source
reviews.reviewText: Good Working Power Source Unit for crypto mining

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Working fine lightly loaded but LOUD
reviews.reviewText: I have been running this for around six weeks now driving a 3080 and 1070 FE. Zero problems, but it is so loud I am thinking about replacing it with something quieter. It drowns out the two GPU and one CPU fan running at 100%, and this rig is running in an office environment. Also, mea culpa, but I was caught by surprise that it was non-modular. Just looked at the picture briefly and did not see anything about modularity in the description so made the mistake of assuming. I would have preferred a modular supply. Otherwise, it has been running fine and the price is right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great PSU for 8 GPU mining rig
reviews.reviewText: I bought the HVVH 1600W PSU because I wanted all the power in one PSU for powering a 8 GPU mining rig. This is a great PSU, is has plenty of power outputs for everything. It handles this task with ease. Its quit and cool, although admittedly I only just started using it so we'll see how it shapes up long term. The PSU runs totally silent (honestly I had to check to make sure the fan was spinning) and stays very cool, even when the CPU and GPU are under full load (8 Gigabyte RX 5700XT all overclocked and Mobo).If you're looking for a quality gold rated PSU, I wouldn't hesitate to pick one of these up! in fact I just bought more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was dead upon arrival, unfortunately I did not try to set up until a couple months later and I contacted manufacturer through amazon and have yet to hear back from them. Will not do business with them again since they can't even take the time to reply

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great nice and quiet long lasting
reviews.reviewText: Great cheap mining psu. Running 4 1080ti's and a asus b250 mobo on 110v for several months now no issues. Pretty quiet an stays cool. Only gets loud an hot when i over load it with more gpus but i have server psu's for my other gpu's so i dont max this one out. Worth every penny for what i got. Would definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feedback posted by mistake
reviews.reviewText: I was writing a review for a dofferent product and later I realized that hte review went to another seller. I deeply regret my error and apologize humbly. The product I received was awesome and I am very happy with it
